name: Seph
description:
Seph awoke.

Her husband was gone! Word came that her father cannot be found, either! 

Fight the beasts on earth, in the heavens, and the underworld. Know that if they should release you from your mortal body, Death is just the beginning!

Find karmic coins to store up karmic energy. (You're carried to the heavens upon death).

Portals will move you from realm to realm.

In the heavens you can fly.

In the underworld your weapon is  fire!

Source code available at: https://github.com/psynut/Seph
